title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9.16 - Executive Order No. 16: Continuing the Declaration of Disaster Emergency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9.16 - Executive Order No. 16: Continuing the Declaration of Disaster Emergency

State Regulations
WHEREAS, pursuant to Executive Order 211, issued July
6,2021, a statewide disaster was declared across die State of New York due to
gun violence; NOW, THEREFORE, I, KATHY HOCHUL, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution of the

State of New York and Article 2-B of the Executive Law, do hereby extend the
state disaster emergency as set forth in Executive Order 211, as continued in

Executive Order 3.10, and continue the terms, conditions, and suspensions
contained in Executive Order 211, until September 18, 2022. GIVEN under my hand and the Privy Seal of the State in the

City of Albany this nineteenth day of August in the year two thousand
twenty-two

Signed: Kathy Hochul

Dated: August 19, 2022

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
